title: DevaCurl One Condition (32 oz)
description: DevaCurl One Condition Ultra Creamy Instant Conditioner - Keep curls shiny and manageable with this ultra-creamy super rich conditioner. DevaCurl One Condition restores, hydrates, neutralizes odor and eliminates product residue. Scented with Lemon Grass. For all hair types. (32 oz)
